## ViewTemplate.render() method

Creates an HTMLView from this template, binds it to the source, and then appends it to the host.

**Signature:**

```typescript
render(source: TSource, host: Node, hostBindingTarget?: Element): HTMLView<TSource, TParent>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

source


</td><td>

TSource


</td><td>

The data source to bind the template to.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

host


</td><td>

Node


</td><td>

The Element where the template will be rendered.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

hostBindingTarget


</td><td>

Element


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ An HTML element to target the host bindings at if different from the host that the template is being attached to.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[HTMLView](../fast-element.htmlview/)<!-- -->&lt;TSource, TParent&gt;
